DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Multiple Periodontal Pocket Periodontium Diagnosis Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to dental practice diagnosis of a number of areas of abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus from examination of the fibrous connective tissue surrounding the root of a tooth that separates it from and attaches it to the alveolar bone.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Multiple Periodontal Pocket Periodontium Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to dental practice diagnosis of a number of areas of abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus from examination of the fibrous connective tissue surrounding the root of a tooth that separates it from and attaches it to the alveolar bone.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Property.preferredDefinition: many copies of or many forms:An abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus.:No value exists.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: Having, relating to, or consisting of more than one individual, element, part, or other component; manifold.
An abnormal deepening of a gingival sulcus associated with destruction of the supporting periodontal tissue.
The fibrous connective tissue surrounding the root of a tooth that separates it from and attaches it to the alveolar bone.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
